channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: In an attempt to reverse the Supreme Court’s immunity decision, Schumer introduces the No Kings Act
item.description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer is introducing legislation reaffirming presidents don’t have immunity for criminal actions, an attempt to reverse the Supreme Court’s landmark decision last month.

item.title: Jets’ McCutcheon has made mental health awareness his mission since best friend’s death in 8th grade
item.description: Lance McCutcheon can’t remember what caused the sudden rift between him and his best friend. The details don’t really matter now to the New York Jets wide receiver.

item.title: Stock market today: World shares are mostly lower as Tokyo sinks on stronger yen
item.description: Global markets are mostly lower and Japan’s stock index tumbled as the U.S. dollar sank against the yen after the head of the Federal Reserve suggested a cut to interest rates will come soon.
